alert.note: Alert for Adair (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 13 at 9:16AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM CDT FOR WASHINGTON AND SOUTHEASTERN ADAIR COUNTIES... At 915 AM CDT, a cluster of severe thunderstorms was centered 4 miles northeast of Strickler, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Farmington... Prairie Grove... Elkins... West Fork... Lincoln... Greenland... Winslow... Blackburn... Devils Den State Park... Brentwood... Strickler... Drake Field Airport... Goshen... Walnut Grove... Woolsey... Rhea... Canehill... Odell... Morrow... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 41 and 65. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
